abstract: Appaloosa Management, the hedge fund run by David Tepper, looks set to bank one of the biggest one-year profits in recent memory, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Appaloosa Management, the hedge fund run by David Tepper, looks set to bank one of the biggest one-year profits in recent memory, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Appaloosa Management, the hedge fund run by David Tepper, appears likely to record one of the biggest one-year profits in recent memory, The Wall Street Journal reported.
